entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle or flurries this evening and overnight. Fog patches overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle or flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.
